title: New: Disclosure – White Noise (Feat. AlunaGeorge)
body: The rise and rise of uber-talented teenagers **Disclosure** has seen them playing everywhere from Ibiza to Bestival, alongside charting at number 11 with their **Sam Smith** featuring single, [Latch](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=93ASUImTedo). With their debut album expected in March, they’ve teamed up with BBC Sound of 2013 nominees **AlunaGeorge** for their next single _White Noise_. Moving away from the garage-house sound experienced on earlier tracks, it’s an out-and-out pop hit, complete with club friendly hook and the alluring vocals of **Aluna Francis**.
